title: Roadside Assistance Request
description: A policyholder's car has a flat tire and they are calling to use their roadside assistance coverage.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and verify they have roadside assistance coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer and their active coverage.

tasks.description: Gather the customer's location and the nature of the problem (flat tire).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately records the location and service needed.

tasks.description: Dispatch a tow truck from a local network provider and give the customer an estimated time of arrival.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully dispatches a service vehicle and provides an accurate ETA.
